text:
Read the text:
"Recent studies suggest that healthy eating extends life expectancy. Experts argue that we must pay attention to this trend to ensure a better future."

What do experts suggest about healthy eating?

options.text: That it is not important at all.
That we should ignore the trend.
That it has no impact on society.

explanation: The text explicitly states that healthy eating extends life expectancy.

options.text: That it has no impact on society.

That it is not important at all.
That it improves flexibility but reduces social contact.

explanation: The text explicitly states that remote work improves flexibility but reduces social contact.
